Package hospital.staff

Class WorkingHours

java.lang.Object
hospital.staff.WorkingHours
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class WorkingHours
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Working hours class defines working hours of the Professional. Day of Week is defined in the HashSet WorkingHours in the Professional class.
See Also:
